description.p: *NOTE*: This is an inofficial Flatpak repackaging of the official release of Camunda Modeler.

Camunda Modeler is a low-code visual designer tool to model, connect, and prepare your BPMN business processes for execution. Using standards like BPMN and DMN, you can align IT and business with a common model and language. The result is better, more efficient workflows, delivered faster.

li.p: You can now create diagrams for Camunda 8.8. We also added support for an updating user task listener.
We improved our validation of Camunda 8 ad-hoc subprocesses. Additionally, the modeler now recognizes documentation URLs provided by linter plug-ins.
Find elements using Camunda-specific search terms. Change the type of an event without losing its implementation details.
As always, this release incorporates bug fixes and additional minor improvements.
You can now model an Ad-hoc subprocess and define its active elements. Learn more.

p.b: Support for latest Camunda 8 FEEL built-ins

li.p: The FEEL expression editor now supports the latest built-in functions. Learn more.
As always, this release incorporates bug fixes and additional minor improvements.
